content: Robo-Advisors MoneyOwl Investments Savings Asked by Maxwell TanAsked on 03 Jul 2019Does MoneyOwl allow multiple portfolio to be created under one user id like StashAway? From my knowledge, Stashaway allows multiple portfolios with different risk levels be created for users. Does MoneyOwl allow the same thing too?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Boh Jia Jing (James), Associate Product Manager at MoneyowlLevel 3. WonderkidUpdated on 08 Jul 2019Hi Maxwell,Yinghua is right that currently, MoneyOwl only caters for one portfolio for each user. However, we are already in the midst of coming up with a multiple portfolio feature. Stay tuned! :)2 comments2

Maxwell Tan05 Jul 2019Thank You!Boh Jia Jing (James)08 Jul 2019No prob! Am always glad to be of help. If you would like to be informed when the multiple portfolio feature is out, do pm me at james@moneyowl.com.sg and i will give you an update!
Yinghua LiuLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 04 Jul 2019Nope. Only one portfolio for MoneyOwl.1 comment0
